```{r}
library(readr)
exData2 <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tpemartin/github-data/master/exData2.csv")
currency <- exData2$幣別
```
給你一大筆資料 head代表頭6個資料
發現currency是character
轉成factor才能看levels
```{r}
head(currency)
class(currency)
levels(currency)
```


```{r}
currency <- as.factor(currency)
class(currency)
levels(currency)
```
裡面有幾種資料?
```{r}
length(levels(currency))
```

想知道一堆資料中有幾筆資料是"日圓"
利用sum函數
```{r}
sum(currency == "日圓JPY/USD")
```
